name: jr0cket.github.io
tagline: Repository for my User Github pages
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages of @jr0cket, community developer.

I have a collection of slides on developer tools and Clojure, each delivered as an HTML5 webpage for easy viewing.  Each slide deck was written using Emacs Org-mode and converted into presentations that use the JavaScript and CSS from Reveal.js.  

I currently have the following presentations

* [Getting started with Git](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/getting-started-with-git.html) - **work in progress**
* [Getting started with Git](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/getting-started-with-clojure.html)
* [Presenting with emacs](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/presenting-with-emacs.html)
* [Introduction to RevealJS (the original)](http://jr0cket.github.io/slides/revealjs.html)


I also write articles on these topics and many more at [blog.jr0cket.co.uk](http://blog.jr0cket.co.uk) and can be reached via [twitter](http://twitter.com/jr0cket)

Thank you.
John Stevenson
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
